comment.author: 32165133@N00
comment._content: The photographer, Frank Clark Scott is distant family! He had a well to do studio in Detroit for some time, I have heard. Also a decent painter... -- Found in a search. (?)

comment.author: 37756439@N05
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/john_rav] 
Well than you and I are possibly related - Frank Scott was my great grandfathers brother.

comment.author: 68190983@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/john_rav] Then you're MY distant family!  Montedog's dad, one of my cousins, just called and told me that I'm related to him.  I'm also a painter, so it was especially significant to me.  I had thought I was the lone artist in the family.
